titles.title: Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2018
Department of Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Act, 2018
Department of Transportation Appropriations Act, 2018

An original bill making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018, and for other purposes.
Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2018

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Collins. With written report No. 115-138.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 185.
